app_content: is a platform that helps travelers discover cities, find events, and book hotels. We aggregate curated listings, real attendee insights, and up-to-date availability to make trip planning simple and secure.
usage_treaty:

usage_policy:
1. Prohibited Activities
You may not:
•  Use the service for any unlawful purpose or to violate any law or regulation.
•  Post or transmit content that is illegal, defamatory, fraudulent, infringing, obscene, hateful, harassing, or otherwise harmful.
•  Impersonate any person or entity, or misrepresent your affiliation.
•  Attempt to gain unauthorized access, probe or test vulnerabilities, or circumvent security.
•  Introduce malware, bots, or automated scraping tools without explicit permission.
•  Copy, mirror, or harvest data at scale, or use the platform for competitive analysis contrary to fair use.
•  Interfere with service availability (e.g., DDoS, rate abuse, or excessive requests).
•  Resell access or use the service for commercial timesharing without authorization.
2. Data and Privacy
•  Only collect or process personal data as allowed by applicable law and our Privacy Policy.
•  Do not attempt to de-anonymize or re-identify data.
3. Reviews and Content
•  Reviews must be truthful and based on genuine experiences.
•  Do not offer or accept compensation for reviews.
4. Security
•  Keep your account credentials secure.
•  Report suspected security issues to [admin@touristguide.com] immediately.
5. Enforcement
•  Violations may result in warnings, suspension, termination, or legal action.
laws_review:
1. Consumer Protection and E-Commerce
•  We display prices, fees, and material terms clearly before purchase.
•  We honor disclosed cancellation and refund terms and applicable consumer rights.
2. Privacy and Data Protection
•  We collect and process personal data in accordance with applicable laws (e.g., GDPR, CCPA) where relevant.
•  Users may request access, correction, or deletion as required by law. Contact: [CONTACT_EMAIL].
3. Payments and Financial Compliance
•  Payments are processed via PCI-DSS compliant providers.
•  We do not store full payment card data on our servers.
4. Content and IP
•  We respect intellectual property rights and respond to valid takedown requests.
•  Users must have rights to content they upload.
5. Accessibility
•  We strive to improve accessibility and consider WCAG guidelines where feasible.
6. Children and Age Restrictions
•  The service is intended for adults (18+ or the age of majority in their jurisdiction).
7. Anti-Spam and Communications
•  We obtain required consent for marketing communications and provide opt-out controls.
8. Data Security and Retention
•  We implement reasonable technical and organizational measures.
•  Data is retained only as necessary for the purposes stated or as required by law.
9. Export Controls and Sanctions
•  We do not provide services in violation of applicable export control or sanctions regimes.
10. Taxes and Local Regulations
•  Where applicable, we collect or display taxes and comply with local rules for lodging and events.
11. Dispute Resolution and Jurisdiction
•  Disputes are governed by the laws of [JURISDICTION]. Venue and process are described in our Terms of Use.
12. Changes to this Statement
•  We may update this statement to reflect legal or operational changes.
